code: import React,{useState}from'react';import spanishFlag from'../../assets/spain-flag.jpg';import englishFlag from'../../assets/usa-flag.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageButton=_ref=>{let{onChange}=_ref;const[isChecked,setIsChecked]=useState(false);const handleToggle=()=>{setIsChecked(!isChecked);onChange(!isChecked);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toggle-switch-language",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"language-button",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(isChecked?spanishFlag:englishFlag,")"),width:'45px',height:'35px',backgroundSize:'100% 100%',backgroundRepeat:'no-repeat',backgroundPosition:'center',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},onClick:handleToggle})});};export default LanguageButton;
